summary: a little cabin with a hidden armory and a forging shed outside
descriptionHtml:
this mod adds a small cabin south of Riverwood close to where you exit the cave from Helgen. It is shown on your map. The features include:

Forging area outside
woodcutters block
archery target
hidden armory in the basement
trophy room
cooking pot
safe storage
and all your other basic needs

To install just download the file and unzip it into your Skyrim Data folder. 

Thanks to leemcky314 for helping layout the interior and be sure to check out some of his mods here on the nexus.
author: EXITWOUND911
